name: The Essays of Samuel Johnson
description: A collection of my favourite essays by Samuel Johnson from his books "The Rambler", "The Adventurer" and "The Idler"

name: Shakespeare's Sonnets
description: A collection of my favourite sonnets by William Shakespeare

name: The Great Re-Ripping
description: Remembering that time I re-ripped all five-hundred-something of my CDs because I wanted to switch to lossless on my iPod.

name: The Vertical Album Phenomenon
description: Have you ever noticed all those Grunge albums with the vertical text? Or those albums from the 1990's with the typewriter fonts? This is a collection of albums of not too dissimilar origin which have similar cover design.

name: The Skin Yard Fanpage
description: Possibly the only fan page on the internet dedicated to Skin Yard: one of Grunge's pioneers.

name: My CD Collection
description: A very basic page which displays the album art of all my CD's. It might be better to take a look on Discogs for now.

name: CD Collection Categorized
description: Categories and 'mini-collections' within my collectionâ€”how I mentally think of the music rather than how I've sorted it on the shelf.

name: Favourite Bands, Albums & Songs
description: A somewhat comprehensive list of my all-time favourite bands, albums and songs.

name: Playlist: Coffee Shop Rock
description: Harmless, inoffensive 'adult alternative' with a couple of sparse hits in between. Lots of Jangle-Pop and Power-Pop mixed in with the Grunge/Post-Grunge of the 1990s

name: The Soundtrack of Summer 2025
description: The albums and songs which played on repeat during the Summer of 2025.

name: My VHS Shelf
description: Take a look at my shelf with this semi-interactive tour!

name: Winter 2025 in Black & White
description: A selection of photos from the Winter of 2025 shot in Black & White on my Nikon D40

name: A Better Way To Show My Favourite Albums
description: Other than putting The Dark Side of The Moon at the top of a list, it's difficult for me to rank my favourite albums. These are the sounds my universe revolves around.

name: My Tape Collection
description: A very basic page which shows my cassette tape collection

name: Pink Floyd's "Echoes" and 2001: A Space Odyssey
description: My experience watching 2001: A Space Odyssey in 4k for the first time along with a mysterious perfect sync with Pink Floyd's "Echoes"

name: Never Forget What They Took From Us
description: A story of love, loss and ice cream.
